title: URGENT: Loose Scaffolding - Building 2 with Active Crew
body:
INCIDENT REPORT - Digital Foreman Safety System

ğŸ“… Timestamp: 2025-12-31 14:32:15 PST
ğŸ‘¤ Reporter: Mike Rodriguez

ğŸš¨ Urgency Level: EMERGENCY

--- INCIDENT DESCRIPTION ---
Scaffolding appears loose/unstable on Building 2 with active crew currently working on the structure. Immediate evacuation and inspection required.

--- CONVERSATION TRANSCRIPT ---
Worker: "Scaffolding looks loose on building 2"
Rachel: "Thanks for reporting that scaffolding issue on building 2. Is anyone working near it right now?"
Worker: "Yeah, there's a crew up there"
Rachel: "Got it. I'm marking this as an emergency since there's a crew at risk. Let me notify the Safety Manager immediately."

--- IMMEDIATE ACTION ITEMS ---
ğŸ”´ EVACUATE crew from Building 2 scaffolding immediately
ğŸ”´ INSPECT scaffolding structure before resuming work  
ğŸ”´ CONTACT Mike Rodriguez for additional details if needed
ğŸ”´ DOCUMENT findings and corrective actions taken

--- SAFETY CLASSIFICATION ---
This incident has been classified as EMERGENCY due to:
- Active personnel exposure to potential fall hazard
- Structural integrity concerns with scaffolding
- Immediate life safety risk present

Reported via Digital Foreman Voice Safety System
